Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class dds::DataInstanceReader< T >

The DataInstanceReader provides a simple way of reading a specific DDS instance. Instances of this class are creadeted via a specific factory method available in the class DataReader.

Author:
Angelo Corsaro <mailto:angelo.corsaro@gmail.com>
Version:
0.1

template<typename T >
dds::ReturnCode_t dds::DataInstanceReader< T >::read ( TSeq &  samples,
long  max_samples 
) [inline]

Reads at most max_samples samples that have not been read yet from all vies and alive instances.

Definition at line 92 of file instance_reader.hpp.

template<typename T >
dds::ReturnCode_t dds::DataInstanceReader< T >::read ( TSeq &  samples,
dds::SampleInfoSeq &  infos 
) [inline]

Reads all new samples from any view state and alive instances. Notice that this call is intended to loan the samples as well as the <conde>infos containers, thus will require a return_loan.

template<typename T >
dds::ReturnCode_t dds::DataInstanceReader< T >::take ( TSeq &  samples,
dds::SampleInfoSeq &  infos 
) [inline]

Takes all new samples from any view state and alive instances. Notice that this call is intended to loan the samples as well as the <conde>infos containers, thus will require a return_loan.
